ch.randelshofer.quaqua
Class QuaquaDropTargetListener

java.lang.Object
  ch.randelshofer.quaqua.QuaquaDropTargetListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.plaf.UIResource
public class QuaquaDropTargetListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener, javax.swing.plaf.UIResource, java.awt.event.ActionListener

QuaquaDropTargetListener is mostly a copy of javax.swing.basic.BasicDropTargetListener. This probably violates some licenses, but I don't know any other way to override the behavior of BasicTreeUI.

Version:
1.0 November 10, 2007 Created.
Author:
Werner Randelshofer
